title: Why is the Icon for Camouflage based on Twitch, when Evelynn was the first Champion with Camouflage?

replies.body:
Because he's a rat and it looks cooler than some low res lady (because of the icon's size).
Can we stop trying to find things to get offended over?

No. 

Lets be honest, when you think about Camouflage, which Champion do you think of first?

Twitch but i never play eve so it doesnt matter what my opinion is.
It's just an icon and it has no hidden anti eve agenda
well... Twitch is also one of the most broken ADCs, so... Twitch is clearly a favorite
you are not being rational.
He's being very RATional.
of course hes not or this thread would not exist in the first place.

No, i think of twitch i prefer him over evelyn. Besides How many evelyns did you see in the last 2-3 years? compare that to the amount of twitch (even before he became a strong meta pick).

Twitch is played more, thus more popular and people will think of him before eve for that reason.

Another reason like jack said is that it's just thematically more fitting to put a rat in there than a lady.

Besides before Camouflage became a thing both just had invisibility, eve with an added restriction. Now that restriction is called camouflage, so they kinda got it on the same day.

> No, i think of twitch i prefer him over evelyn. Besides How many evelyns did you see in the last 2-3 years? compare that to the amount of twitch (even before he became a strong meta pick)

You just proved his point

Eve Has been thrash for a while. Twitch was decent until this meta. Was riot stop with the favouritism.

And yea, i play twitchbut not Evelyn so if i was riot that would prove his point. But rito doesn't give a shit about who i prefer.

Goodjob ignoring everything else i said tho.

Theeerrreeee we go i knew what this thread was about, it reeked from it.
Thanks for confirming my thoughts
This thread is about nothing, i was just bored xD
Not an excuse
Probably because that ability icon looked a lot nicer than old Evelynn's.
They came out the same day

Evelynn got the Camouflage Mechanic in Patch 1.0.0.143, which came out July 2012. 

Twitch had Invisibility at that time. Twitch only got Camouflage instead of Invisibility in Patch 6.22 November 2016.
that's a new mechanic bro

Evelynn had it before it was named Camouflage. 
It exists since Season 1
Actually no,since there are some differences between Eves old stealth and the camouflage(for example you wouldn't be revealed for a short time if you get hit by an attack)
I think it's because that icon fits the term camouflage more than Eve's passive icon does
I think that's just a placeholder icon until they get actual unique art for it. That's just Twitch's Q icon.
